means: 苯氧胺；美氏牌速降压灵；阿坦乐尔

word_mean: 阿替洛尔:心脏选择性β1肾上腺素能受体阻滞剂,用于高血压和慢性心绞痛的治疗
阿替洛尔是长效β-肾上腺素受体阻滞药，对心脏选择性强，抑制窦房结及房室结自律性，减慢房室结传导，对希—普系统也有抑制作用。

sentence.Network_en: CONCLUSIONS atenolol gel can be used for intranasal administration.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论:阿替洛尔凝胶可用于鼻腔给药.

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To evaluate cytotoxicity of atenolol nasal gel.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:评价阿替洛尔鼻用凝胶剂的纤毛毒性.

sentence.Network_en: What could be the possible mechanism of the difference amlodipine group and the atenolol group?
sentence.Network_cn: 能否分析一下差异发生的可能机制?

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1970s: perhaps from a(ngina) + ten(sion) + (propran)olol, a related compound

means.word_mean: 1. an oral beta blocker (trade name Tenormin) used in treating hypertension and angina; has adverse side effects (depression and exacerbation of congestive heart failure etc.)
